attributes.background: Dementia patients are being detained and subjected to a force full treatnent order there is no cure no slowing it down

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be a clinical decision for Doctors and not one for the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about the Mental Health Act and how to challenge a decision here:

https://www.nhs.uk/using-the-nhs/nhs-services/mental-health-services/mental-health-act/

You could start a new petition calling for changes to the Mental Health Act if that is something you would like to see happen.
